channel.title: Need new run.bat code
channel.description:
well for some reason when i click the run.bat, it goes up and then right away just closes again and again.
i was told i need a new run.bat code, could some one please help me.

item.title: Need new run.bat code
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“alex4ever, post:1, topic:242113”]well for some reason when i click the run.bat, it goes up and then right away just closes again and again.

i was told i need a new run.bat code, could some one please help me.[/quote]I’m not sure it’s the run.bat code. but here’s the containments of a normal run.bat

@echo off color 0a title Allstar-Scape v1 java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server

just copy and paste this into your run.server. click edit to get into it.

Read full topic
